Package idare.imagenode.internal.DataManagement

Class NodeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • idare.imagenode.internal.DataManagement.NodeManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDARENodeManager, idare.imagenode.internal.DataManagement.Events.DataSetChangeListener
    public class NodeManager
extends Object
implements idare.imagenode.internal.DataManagement.Events.DataSetChangeListener, IDARENodeManager
    NodeManager manages the nodes used in the IDARE App.
    Author:
    Thomas Pfau

      • update

        public void update​(DataSet ds,
                   boolean added)
        Update the Manager/Nodes with the new DataSet, either adding it or removing it form the nodes.
        Parameters:

        added - whether the dataset was added

      • getNode

        public ImageNodeModel getNode​(String ID)
        Get the Node corresponding to the given ID
        Parameters:
        ID - The ID of the node
        Returns:
        a node, if it exists, or null, if the ID is not linked to a known node.

      • getNodesWithData

        public Collection<String> getNodesWithData()
        Get all nodes, that have associated data.
        Returns:
        all nodes that have at least one associated dataset.

      • generateLayoutsForNodes

        public void generateLayoutsForNodes​(Set<DataSet> datasets,
                                    idare.imagenode.internal.Layout.ImageNodeLayout layout,
                                    org.cytoscape.work.TaskMonitor monitor)
                             throws TooManyItemsException,
                                    ContainerUnplaceableExcpetion,
                                    DimensionMismatchException,
                                    WrongDatasetTypeException
        Generate Layouts for All nodes in the DataSets present in the DataSetLayoutInfoBundles provided. This version is to be used if the created nodes are created by a Task.
        Parameters:
        datasets - The datasets to create nodes for
        layout - the layout to use for the nodes
        monitor - The TaskMonitor that keeps track of progress.
        Throws:
        TooManyItemsException - if there are too many items
        ContainerUnplaceableExcpetion - if a container cannot be placed
        DimensionMismatchException - if the dimensions dont fit.
        WrongDatasetTypeException - if a dataset cannot be layout out with the layout.

      • generateLayoutsForNodes

        public void generateLayoutsForNodes​(Set<DataSet> datasets,
                                    idare.imagenode.internal.Layout.ImageNodeLayout layout)
                             throws TooManyItemsException,
                                    ContainerUnplaceableExcpetion,
                                    DimensionMismatchException,
                                    WrongDatasetTypeException
        Generate Layouts for All nodes in the DataSets present in the DataSetLayoutInfoBundles provided.
        Parameters:
        datasets - the datasets t generate layouts for
        layout - the layout to use for the nodes
        Throws:
        TooManyItemsException - if too many items were in the datasets
        ContainerUnplaceableExcpetion - if a container could not be placed
        DimensionMismatchException - if dimensions could not fit
        WrongDatasetTypeException - if a dataset could not be layout out with the selected type of layout

      • isNodeLayouted

        public boolean isNodeLayouted​(String id)
        Check whether a tge node with the given ID is layouted
        Parameters:
        id - The node id to check
        Returns:
        true if there is a layout for the given ID, or false otherwise. THis does not check, whether the node exists at all.

      • isNodeActive

        public boolean isNodeActive​(String id)
        Check whether the node with the given ID is layouted and needs an image.
        Parameters:
        id - The node ID to check
        Returns:
        true if there is a layout for the given ID, and it is needed.false otherwise. THis does not check, whether the node exists at all.

      • getLayoutForNode

        public idare.imagenode.internal.Layout.ImageNodeLayout getLayoutForNode​(String id)
        Get the layout for a specific id
        Parameters:
        id - The node ID to get the layout for
        Returns:
        the layout associated with the ID, or null if the ID has no associated layout.

      • getLayoutedIDs

        public Collection<String> getLayoutedIDs()
        Get a Collection of IDs for which layouts exist.
        Returns:
        A Collection of Strings containing all IDs with an associated Layout

      • getActiveIDs

        public Collection<String> getActiveIDs()
        Get a Collection of IDs for which layouts exist and which are active.
        Returns:
        A Collection of Strings containing all IDs with an associated Layout

      • handleEvent

        public void handleEvent​(org.cytoscape.session.events.SessionAboutToBeSavedEvent arg0,
                        IDAREImageNodeApp app)
        Handle a SessionAboutToBeSavedEvent. Since the order in which the event is handles by the different components of the app is important, This Object does not itself implement the listener, but requires another function to call the handling operation.
        Parameters:
        arg0 - the event to handle
        app - the IDAREImageNodeApp to use for reference

      • handleEvent

        public void handleEvent​(org.cytoscape.session.events.SessionLoadedEvent arg0,
                        IDAREImageNodeApp app)
        Restore the data of this nodemanager. Since we need to have a specific order for DataSetManager and NodeManager restoration, this cannot simply be achieved by implementing the SessionLoadedListener interface
        Parameters:
        arg0 - the event to handle
        app - the IDAREImageNodeApp for reference

      • getNodesForLayout

        public Collection<String> getNodesForLayout​(idare.imagenode.internal.Layout.ImageNodeLayout Layout)
        Create a Collection of IDs that are associated with a specific Layout.
        Parameters:
        Layout - the layout to get nodes for
        Returns:
        the Nodes IDs assigned to the provided ImageNodeLayout

      • writeNodeLayouts

        public void writeNodeLayouts​(File LayoutFile,
                             IDAREImageNodeApp app)
                      throws IOException
        Write a structure that can be read again by a nodemanager to restore the current state of the manager.
        Parameters:
        LayoutFile - the File to write the lyouts to
        app - the IDAREImageNodeApp as reference
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong during IO

      • readNodeLayouts

        public void readNodeLayouts​(File LayoutFile,
                            IDAREImageNodeApp app)
                     throws IOException
        Read Layout data saved in a given File to restore old nodemanager data.
        Parameters:
        LayoutFile - The File to read the layouts from
        app - the IDAREImageNodeApp as reference
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong during IO
